tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE communication_history (
    communication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    communication_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    policyholder_id INT NOT NULL,
    agent_id INT,
    communication_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE communication_history (
	communication_id INT,
	policyholder_id INT,
	agent_id INT,
	communication_type VARCHAR(50),
	communication_date DATE,
	communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE policy_documents (
	document_id INT,
	policy_id INT,
	document_type VARCHAR(50),
	document_content TEXT,
	document_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Communications (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_date TIMESTAMP,
    policyholder_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policyholder_id) REFERENCES Policyholders(policyholder_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES Agents(agent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE emails (
    email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender VARCHAR(255),
    recipient VARCHAR(255),
    subject VARCHAR(255),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE phone_calls (
    call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    caller VARCHAR(255),
    receiver VARCHAR(255),
    duration INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE policy_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_type VARCHAR(255),
    policyholder VARCHAR(255),
    agent VARCHAR(255),
    document_content TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(255),
    policyholder VARCHAR(255),
    agent VARCHAR(255),
    details TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE emails (
  email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_email VARCHAR(255),
  recipient_email VARCHAR(255),
  subject VARCHAR(255),
  body TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE phone_calls (
  call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  caller_number VARCHAR(15),
  receiver_number VARCHAR(15),
  call_duration INT,
  call_type VARCHAR(10),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE policy_documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_content TEXT,
  approval_status VARCHAR(20),
  upload_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE policyholders (
  policyholder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE agents (
  agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  region VARCHAR(50)
)
